info.name: DarkDevelop - a dark theme for TouchDevelop
info.description: This style brings dark theme to TouchDevelop. It recolors hub, editor, user profiles, screenshot view, etc except of running script view.
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.2
Any problems, ideas, questions? Contact me denis.mukhametov@gmail.com

Changelog:
Version 1.2 - 22 July 2015 - search highlight fixed, minor improvements
Version 1.1 - 28 June 2015 - diff screen fixed, comments and brackets more visible, minor improvements
Version 1.0 - 17 June 2015 - first release
